results.name: Sum of digits of n-th triangular number.
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
maple: P:=proc(n) local a,i,k,w; a:=0; for i from 1 by 1 to n do a:=a+i; w:=0; k:=a; while k>0 do w:=w+k-(trunc(k/10)*10); k:=trunc(k/10); od; print(w); od; end: P(100); # _Paolo P. Lava_, May 03 2007
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
